title: From That Moment
description: When Lia Bertoli walks into her first day of graduate school, she’s dreaming about the exciting discoveries she will make as a Ph.D. student. She never imagined that her first day would bring her face-to-face with the man who last saw her in a most embarrassing situation. A moment she had hoped to forget forever.  Colin is a brilliant graduate student, and tall, dark and handsome to boot. He dreams of becoming a college Professor and of the many accolades that will come as a result of his groundbreaking scientific research. He’s on a mission, and no woman has ever managed to come before his work.  Against all odds, their paths cross again and they have to find a way to work together…Will their old feelings make this impossible, or will new passionate feelings arise and bring them closer than they ever expected?  This is the first story in the Unexpected Love series, featuring fun and sexy love stories in urban settings. For mature readers (18+).  **Please note: this is a novella of approximately 100 pages length.  **Also, you don't need a Kindle reader to enjoy this story. You can use the free Kindle app on any device that you own.
author: Anna Park
